tombstone.epitaph:
Print, Le Barbier, from Les Metiers series  [The Barber,  from The Trades series], 1632–35. Etching on thin cream paper. 
Museum purchase from Friends of Drawings and Prints Fund through gift of David and Elaine Chandler, Sigmund Balka, Florence G. Blaustein, Ms. Emily Geltman, Dr. and Mrs. Gregory Heimarck, Eylene and Donald King, Silvia B. Paulson, Jeanette Rattiner, Shirley A. Samis, Carol F. and Larry Snow, Joseph and Marion Lieben Weissman, and Joann R. and Allan G. Winkler in memory of Sylvia Chandler and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2000-35-1
